abstract: Gregory Crouch reviews book Continental Divide: A History of American Mountaineering by Maurice Isserman.

keywords.value: Continental Divide: A History of American Mountaineering (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: Maurice Isserman looks at the history of America through the lens of a sometimes misunderstood endeavor.
